pkgmetadata.longdescription: # NLIGraphSpacyKnowledge graph using NLP Spacy## Installation```pythonpip install nligraphspacy```## Implementation```pythonfrom nligraphspacy import NLIGRAPHnligraph = NLIGRAPH.RelationEntityExtract("She worked in the city of London")nligraph.process_text()# ('She', 'worked', 'London')nligraph.get_seperate_entities()# [{'text': 'A', 'label': ''},# {'text': 'DAG', 'label': 'SOURCE-NODE'},# {'text': 'is', 'label': ''},# {'text': 'used', 'label': 'EDGE'},# {'text': 'for', 'label': ''},# {'text': 'organizing', 'label': ''},# {'text': 'tasks', 'label': 'TARGET-NODE'}]```
